description:
Registration will be open from July 7th to October 15th, 2014.
College Readiness Math MOOC is a self-paced online program designed to enhance your mathematics skills in the areas of Algebra and Geometry. This MOOC is designed to help develop the skills needed to be successful in college mathematics. Other aspects of the Math MOOC include access to college tutors and discussion forums with other MOOC participants centered upon common interests. The videos are led by Guest Lecturer Jen Kosiak and the course is moderated by Robert Allen and Bob Hoar.
Course Goals:


- Enhance algebraic knowledge and skills in areas related to Ratios and Proportional Relationships, Expressions and equations, Geometry, and solving a variety of equations and inequalities


- Determine college mathematics readiness
title: College Readiness Math MOOC
